alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:48AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Franklin, northwestern Webster, Phelps, southwestern Adams, Kearney, southern Buffalo and Harlan Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 648 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Loomis to near Ragan to near Alma. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Funk around 655 AM CDT. Wilcox, Republican City and Harlan County Dam around 700 AM CDT. Naponee around 705 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hildreth, Axtell, Bloomington, Franklin, Upland, Minden, Riverton and Norman. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 261 and 287. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps; Webster
